abstract.para: You must start the FreeRADIUS server after installation.

step.para: After the bootstrap is complete, start the server in debugging mode as a root user.
step.screen: radiusd -X [...] Listening on auth address * port 1812 bound to server default Listening on acct address * port 1813 bound to server default Listening on auth address :: port 1812 bound to server default Listening on acct address :: port 1813 bound to server default Listening on auth address 127.0.0.1 port 18120 bound to server inner-tunnel Listening on proxy address * port 54435 Listening on proxy address :: port 58415 Ready to process requests
step.para: The Listening and Ready to process requests appear when the server starts correctly.
If a FreeRADIUS server is already running, an error Address already in use appears. You must stop that server before running the server in debugging mode.
If the server does not start, verify the output. The output includes the details about the errors. You can direct the output to a text file with tee: radiusd -X | tee radiusd.text
